title: New: Rustie – Slasherr
body:
Everyone and their momz have been posting this new cut from **Rustie**, the first leak from his new single, _Triadzz/Slasher_r, out on Numbers.

Frankly it’s completely worth it, this is big ass beat music at its very best. Happy Fucking Tuesday.

excerpt.full: Everyone and their momz have been posting this new cut from Rustie, the first leak from his new single, Triadzz/Slasherr, out on Numbers. Frankly it’s completely worth it, this is big ass beat music at its very best. Happy Fucking Tuesday.
